snippet: “Tête-à-Tête,” at Yancey Richardson Gallery, was organized by Mickalene Thomas and focuses on portraiture, a genre that bridges both African and American photography.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews group photography show Tete-a-Tete at Yancey Richardson Gallery.
lead_paragraph: “Tête-à-Tête,” at Yancey Richardson Gallery, was organized by Mickalene Thomas and focuses on portraiture, a genre that bridges both African and American photography.
